autotransform.repo package

Submodules

autotransform.repo.base module

The base class and associated classes for Repo components.

class autotransform.repo.base.Repo(params: autotransform.repo.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.repo.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Repo components. Used by AutoTransform to interact with version control and code review systems.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Repo. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses.

Type

TParams

bundle() → autotransform.repo.base.RepoBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

RepoBundle

abstract clean(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Clean any changes present in the Repo that have not been submitted.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch for which we are cleaning the repo.

abstract static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.repo.base.Repo

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Repo.

Return type

Repo

get_params() → autotransform.repo.base.TParams

Gets the paramaters used to set up the Repo.

Returns

The paramaters used to set up the Repo.

Return type

TParams

abstract static get_type() → autotransform.repo.type.RepoType

Used to map Repo components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Repo.

Return type

RepoType

abstract has_changes(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → bool

Check whether any changes have been made to the underlying code based on the Batch.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch that was used for the transformation.

Returns

Returns True if there are any changes to the codebase.

Return type

bool

abstract rewind(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Rewind the repo to a pre-submit state to prepare for executing another Batch. This should NOT delete any submissions (i.e. commits should stay present). Only called after a submit has been done.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch for which changes were submitted.

abstract submit(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Submit the changes to the Repo (i.e. commit, submit pull request, etc…). Only called when changes are present.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch for which the changes were made.

class autotransform.repo.base.RepoBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Repo object used for JSON encoding.

params: Mapping[str, Any]
type: autotransform.repo.type.RepoType

autotransform.repo.factory module

A simple factory for producing Repos from type and param information.

class autotransform.repo.factory.RepoFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Repos. Maps a type to a Repo.

_map

A mapping from RepoType to the from_data function of the appropriate Repo.

Type

Dict[RepoType, Callable[[Mapping[str, Any]], Repo]]

static get(bundle: autotransform.repo.base.RepoBundle) → autotransform.repo.base.Repo

Simple get method using the _map attribute.

Parameters

bundle (RepoBundle) – The bundled Repo type and params.

Returns

An instance of the associated Repo.

Return type

Repo

autotransform.repo.git module

The implementation for the GitRepo.

class autotransform.repo.git.GitRepo(params: autotransform.repo.git.GitRepoParams)

Bases: autotransform.repo.base.Repo[autotransform.repo.git.GitRepoParams]

A Repo that provides support for commiting changes to git.

_params

Contains tthe base branch name that the changes will be made on top of.

Type

GitRepoParams

_local_repo

An object representing the repo used for git operations.

Type

GitPython

_base_branch

The base branch to use for changes.

Type

Head

BRANCH_NAME_PREFIX: str = 'AUTO_TRANSFORM'
COMMIT_MESSAGE_PREFIX: str = '[AutoTransform]'
clean(_: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Performs git reset –hard to remove any changes.

Parameters

_ (Batch) – Unused Batch object used to match signature to base

commit(title: str) → None

Creates a new branch for all changes, stages them, and commits them.

Parameters

title (str) – The title of the Batch being commited.

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.repo.git.GitRepo

Produces a GitRepo from the provided data.

Parameters

Returns

An instance of the GitRepo.

Return type

GitRepo

static get_branch_name(title: str) → str

Gets a unique name for a git branch using the title from the Batch.

Parameters

title (str) – The title of the change.

Returns

The name of the branch for this change.

Return type

str

Gets a commit message for the change based on the Batch title.

Parameters

has_changes(_: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → bool

Checks the dirty status of the repo, including untracked changes.

Parameters

_ (Batch) – Unused Batch object used to match signature to base.

Returns

Returns True if there are any changes to the repo either staged or unstaged.

Return type

bool

rewind(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

First eliminates any uncommitted changes using the clean function then checks out the initial active branch.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch for the submitted changes that is being rewound.

submit(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Stages all changes and commits them in a new branch.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch for which the changes were made

autotransform.repo.github module

The implementation for the GithubRepo.

class autotransform.repo.github.GithubRepo(params: autotransform.repo.github.GithubRepoParams)

Bases: autotransform.repo.git.GitRepo

A Repo that provides support for submitting changes as a pull request against a Github repo.

_params

Contains all git params as well as the Github repo name and any required labels.

Type

GithubRepoParams

_github_repo

The Github Repository being interacted with.

Type

Repository.Repository

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.repo.github.GithubRepo

Produces a GithubRepo from the provided data.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle

Returns

An instance of the GithubRepo

Return type

GithubRepo

static get_github_object() → github.MainClass.Github

Authenticates with Github to allow API access via a token provided by AutoTransform configuration. If no token is provided a username + password will be used. Also allows use of a base URL for enterprise use cases.

Returns

An object allowing interaction with the Github API.

Return type

Github

get_github_repo() → github.Repository.Repository

Gets the Github repository being interacted with.

Returns

The Github repository being interacted with.

Return type

Repository.Repository

static get_type() → autotransform.repo.type.RepoType

Used to map Repo components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Repo

Return type

RepoType

submit(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Performs the normal submit for a git repo then submits a pull request against the provided Github repo.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch for which the changes were made.

class autotransform.repo.github.GithubRepoParams

Bases: dict

The param type for a GithubRepo.

base_branch_name: str
full_github_name: str

autotransform.repo.type module

The type of Repo, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.repo.type.RepoType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 Repo to type mapping.

GIT = 'git'
GITHUB = 'github'

Module contents

Repos provide functionality for integrating with a version control system, including any associated code review workflow (i.e. Github pull requests)
